Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 43rd overall pick, by Detroit in 1971...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/2/1971, off Ron Reed (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1971, off Dick Radatz (BOS)...
Injured on 5/30/1972 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to Baltimore on 5/28/1973 (Going to DET: P D. Rau. Going to BAL: LF C. Yastrzemski, RF C. Summers)...
